thread.section_title: Optimalprint Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Optimalprint | optimalprint.com.au
thread.title: Kirsty Rickman

author: Kirsty Rickman
title: Kirsty Rickman
text: I ordered wedding invitations, rsvps and used thank you cards to add a little wishing well note. I used the predesigned ones and I absolutely love them! They arrived within 2 days which was very impressive. Only thing I would say is more colour choice and more card texture options would broaden the variety. I recommended them to my sister who also ordered her wedding invites aswell. Thanks optimalprint.
